issue.title: [CF 467] Meta Icon and Group
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Create 1 Group
2. Create a second group
3. Make a meta icon on group 1 that track group 2 icon

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
The meta icon to check all the icon from group 2. An error while logging in stating that I attempt to give a nil value to the meta icon (which is obvious).

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
5.0.2

Do you have an error log of what happened?
1x TellMeWhen: Group: 8, Icon: 1: TellMeWhen\Types\meta.lua:205: attempt to index local "group" (a nil value)
TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-5.0.2.lua:5472: in function <TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:5344>
<in C code>
TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-5.0.2.lua:4660: in function "Setup"
TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-5.0.2.lua:1661: in function <TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:1626>
(tail call): ?
<in C code>
<string>:"safecall Dispatcher[2]":9: in function <string>:"safecall Dispatcher[2]":5
(tail call): ?
Archy-1.8.18\Libs\AceTimer-3.0\AceTimer-3.0-6.lua:164: in function <Archy\Libs\AceTimer-3.0\AceTimer-3.0.lua:138>

Locals:
nil

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)
The error is kinda obvious since the group I am attempting to track is not created yet and would throw an error.


> Posted by CurseForge user InfernalAura | Imported from CurseForge issue #467 | Raw

comments.body:
This was fixed in r491


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Hmmm that's what I though when I read the patch note for 5.0.3 A bit earlier.

Seem like you're fixing issue before we can even find them hehe It's a very good thing. Thank you !


> Posted by CurseForge user InfernalAura
